miniLib/__init__.py¶

Package for Arcade drive, Servos and Joysticks

miniLib.ArcadeDrive¶

class miniLib.ArcadeDrive(LeftServo, rightServo)[source]¶

Setup Arcade drive

Parameters

  • LeftServo (continousServo) – Servo for the left side drive

  • rightServo (continousServo) – Servo for the right side drive

calculate(forward, steer)[source]¶

Internal function to calculate the left and right power

Parameters

  • forward (float) – forward power

  • steer (float) – steer power

Returns

tuple of floats: power for left and right drive

Return type

tuple

drive(forwardPower, steerPower)[source]¶

Drive given the forward and steer axis power Meant to be run inside a while loop

Parameters

  • forwardPower (float) – Forward power from joystick axis

  • steerPower (float) – Steer power from joystick axis

miniLib.Servo¶

class miniLib.Servo[source]¶

Setup servo for using adafruit servokit

newServo(pwmID)[source]¶

Setup a servo given pwm ID

Parameters

pwmID (int) – ID of the servo

Returns

instance of continuous servo

Return type

continuous_servo

miniLib.Joystick¶

class miniLib.Joystick[source]¶

Setup Joystick control using pygame

getAxis(axisID)[source]¶

Get the value of the axis

Parameters

axisID (int) – Id of the axis

Returns

value of the axis

Return type

float

getButton(buttonID)[source]¶

Get the state of the button

Parameters

buttonID (int) – Id of the button

Returns

state of the button

Return type

bool

info()[source]¶

Print out info regarding all connected joystics

newJoystick(id, _return=False)[source]¶

Setup a new joystick

Parameters

  • id (int) – ID of the joystick

  • _return (bool, optional) – return joystick instance, defaults to False

Returns

joystick instance if _return == True

Return type

pygame.joystick.Joystick
